content: make this fun easy crochet top with all the perfect boho vibes the top is made by crocheting granny squares and then attaching them together adding some fringe and some straps and voila if you were really determined i bet you could make this in a day in the tutorial i explain how to sew lining into the top but i only did that so that i wouldn t have to wear a bra if you plan on wearing a bra under this top you can skip the lining the instructions that i give are to make a top that will be approximately a size small basically you want one of the granny squares to be able to cover one side of your chest if you need the granny squares to be bigger there are a couple options provided
